TEI.2.document_title: William Kennert and Company to Stephen F. Austin, 12-24-1817

barker_notes.barker_summary: Statement of account with William Kennert & Co.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 1, pp. 326-327

div1.p: Statement of account with William Kennert & Co.
Stephen F. Austin Esq To William Kennert & C°. Dr

Decb 24 To balance of A/c under this date___________________ 841. 34
To Cash paid notary for Power of Attorney___________ 5. 50
To Interest on $841 34/100 to 24 feb 1814 6p _____ 58. 89 ________ 905. 73
